import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ScreenService } from '../services/screen.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'], }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit { screenWidth: number; constructor(private screenService: ScreenService) {} ngOnInit() { this.screenWidth = this.screenService.getScreenWidth(); } }
